The System of Positive Polity and the Complete Positivism
5. The System of Positive Polity and the Complete Positivism

Soon after finishing the Course, Comte returned to his
initial project and began outlining the System of Positive
Polity. The Discourse on the Positive Spirit, which had
served as the preface to the Philosophical Treatise on Popular
Astronomy (1844), had already emphasized the social purpose of
positivism and its aptitude to replace theology in politics and
morality. But his encounter with Clotilde de Vaux would turn his life
upside down and give Comte’s second career an unexpected twist
(1845–1846).
